name: backbay-sdk
description: Backbay SDK - TypeScript and Python packages for the Backbay platform

scripts.build:ts: for pkg in packages/contract packages/api-client packages/speakeasy packages/glia packages/notary packages/witness packages/witness-react; do echo "Building $pkg" && cd $pkg && bun run build && cd ../..; done
scripts.typecheck: tsc --build packages/contract/tsconfig.json packages/api-client/tsconfig.json packages/speakeasy/tsconfig.json packages/witness/tsconfig.json packages/witness-react/tsconfig.json
scripts.lint:ts: eslint packages/contract/src packages/api-client/src packages/speakeasy/src packages/glia/src packages/notary/src packages/witness/src packages/witness-react/src
